title: 40,000 MT of Diesel to reach SL today (4)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) said that a vessel carrying 40, 000 MT of Diesel will be arriving in the country under the Indian line of credit.
The Chairman of the CPC said that a vessel that arrived on Saturday (2) with 40,000 MT of Diesel, and the shipment was distributed on Sunday (3).
